fulltext:
Anna Bldg, 2nd floor, QTSC, HCM City, Vietnam 
Tel: +0908461533 
DOB: May 30, 1984 
FN: Nguyen Thi Thuy 
Email: thuynt04@gmail.com 
Thuy Nguyen 
Sr. Ruby on Rails Developer 
SUMMARY 
●
Has 10 years in programming, and greater than 7 years in Ruby on Rails programming 
●
Used to plan and manage medium and small projects using Scrum/Agile software
development 
●
Responsibility: 
○
Responsibilities on project start up as: setup environments, deployment, layout
design, Database design. 
○
Review codes and support junior members 
○
Key contact point for any technical issue in team. 
○
Build and develop back-end, api for mobile app. 
○
Skills with NoSQL(MongoDB, Redis), Caching, Payment, Scale/performance 
○
Strong with Rails testing (Rspec, Feature Specs, Cucumber) 
○
Build
web
app
with HTML5 animation, backbonejs, jQueryMobile, bootstrap,
foundation, angularjs. 
○
Deploy to cloud servers such as Heroku, Capistrano to EC2, Kubernetes to gloud. 
○
Tools: Assembla, Trellor, Github, Bitbucket 
○
Project lead: has management skill 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
●
Programming Languages: Ruby 
●
Frameworks/ Platforms: Ruby on Rails, Angularjs, Backbonejs, Bootstraps, foundation,
html5 animation, jQueryMobile, 
●
Database
Management
Systems:
Postgresql,
MySql,
MySql
Cluster,
SQL,
NoSQL(MongoDB, Redis). 
●
TDD, BDD: RSpec 2, Selenium… 
●
Deployment: Heroku, EC2, Kubernetes 
●
Knowledge: Reactjs, Nodejs, Microservices 
●
Operating Systems: Mac, Linux – CentOS 
●
IDEs: Atom, Sublime Text, ... 
Tools or Tools source control: Subversion, Git 
Foreign Languages: English 
Soft Skills: Communication 
Process: Agile and Scrum 
●
●
●
●
PRIOR WORKING EXPERIENCE 
Terralogic Ltd.. 
Senior Ruby on Rails, Project Lead 
May 2017 - present: 
●
Description: Blurb Project is a self-publishing and marketing platform, from US. Blurb’s
platform makes it easy to design, publish, promote, and sell professional-quality printed
books and ebooks. This project is microservice, I have been working on ROR in Blurby
platform and some other javascript services.  
● Responsibilities:  
○
Be a key performance of whole Ruby On rails team works 
○
Solve the technical issue and support others 
○
Weekly standing up report by verbal communication with US client. 
○
Role: Project lead 
● Technologies: 
○
Rails 3, Rspec test, Deploy EC 2  
Beside I have joined to other project to make deploy project to gloud by Kubernetes and do
tasks in Magento Project. 
Mar  2016 – April 2017: (Terralogic Ltd..) 
Project: Game for Rockyou 
●
Description:
RockYou is an interactive media company that owns and partners with
dozens of game titles across Facebook, web and mobile. This project is to enhance 2
games “Dragons of Atlantis” and “The Godfather: Five Families” using Ruby on Rails. 
● Responsibilities: 
○
Be a key performance of whole Ruby on Rails team works. 
○
Be in charge of enhancing features on existing game using Rails 2 (Dragons of
Atlantis) and Rails 3(The Godfather: Five families). 
○
Responsible for supporting in production deployment. 
○
Analyze requirements from customer and transfer to offshore team. 
○
Solve the technical issue and support others 
○
Role: Project lead 
● Accomplishments:  
○
Some new features are in production. 
●
Technologies:  Rails 2, Rails 3, Rspec test , Deploy EC2 
Free Range Technology Ltd.. 
      June 2013 - Feb 2016 (3 years 8 months) 
Sr. Ruby on Rails Developer  
     There are projects which I worked: 
Tele7jeux Project game 
Duration: 6 months 
●
Description:
This is a kind of mobile game, includes games: puzzle, memory, logical,
mystery word, word search puzzle game. 
● Responsibilities:  
○
Parse csv file to import into mysql by complex algorithms. 
○
Build CMS to manage Challenge, Game 
○
Build api for game 
○
Collect customer's requirements 
○
Estimate and detailed plan for development tasks 
○
Role as team leader on project 
● Accomplishments:  
○
The game was released by May 2012 
●
Technologies:  ruby, ruby on rails 3, deploy EC2, delay job 
Varsity Project 
Duration: 20 months 
●
Description: This app supports users view and feedback about school’s events of US’s
states. 
● Responsibilities:  
○
Build CMS manage brand, event, school, state .. 
○
Build api for mobile app 
○
Build responsive web 
○
Collect customer's requirements 
○
Estimate and detailed plan for development tasks 
○
Main key members of development 
● Accomplishments:  
○
This app has first release by December 2012 and continue develop when have 
any new features 
●
Technologies:  ruby, rails 3, deploy EC2, backbonejs, jQuerymobile ... 
Fitfox Project 
Duration: 4 months 
●
Description: This app manage competitions, entrants can join competition and get step,
distance from health app to know who's winner. 
● Responsibilities:  
○
Build api, and CMS for mobile app 
○
Collect customer's requirements 
○
Estimate and detailed plan for development tasks 
○
Role as team leader of project 
● Accomplishments:  
○
The app has last release by June 2015 
●
Technologies:  ruby, rails 4, rspec, deploy by capistrano on Linode server. 
Doctor App Project 
Duration: 12 months 
●
Description: This app use for patients book appointment with a doctor. To book doctor,
app support users find the available doctors, select doctor to make an appointment,
payment for doctor through paypal or judopay. 
● Responsibilities:  
○
Build CMS, api for iOS, Android app 
○
Estimate and detailed plan for development tasks 
○
Main key members of development 
● Accomplishments:  
○
This app has first release by November, 2015 
●
Technologies:  Rails 4, Deploy on EC2 
HJ Voting app
●
This app is used for students can vote school's poll. 
●
School's admin can manage polls. He/she can view the result of voting poll, edit school 
info ... Each of school's students can vote these polls. 
Programming: Rails 4.2, Angularjs, deploy on EC2 
●
Software Engineer at Tech Propulsion Labs
January 2012 - June 2013 (1 year 6 months) Developer at Tech Propulsion Labs 
There are projects which I worked: 
     MyBulle:
MyBulle is sharing media site 
+ Team size: 6 
+ Technology:PHP, HTML, CSS , Dojo, Backbone + In-House Technology: Tonido API 
      MightyBrace 
Created by an orthodontist for orthodontists, Mighty Brace is an engaging and effective 
way to teach patients proper oral hygiene techniques and dietary guidelines. Gameplay 
and direct messaging features foster patient community, bolster learning and provide 
doctors with a simple way to monitor, encourage and document compliance. 
Programming: Rails 3, Jquery, deploy on EC2 
     Educake 
Educake tracks students grades against their individual goals based on The Common 
Core State Standards. 
Programming: Rails 3, Jquery, deploy on EC2 
   Teamzoom
Manage live games show for schools: for registering competitions between schools with 
free or fee... 
Programming: Rails 3, Jquery, deploy on EC2 
Software Engineer at LARION Computing Ltd. 
September 2009 - September 2011 (2 years 1 month)  
EDUCATION 
●
Computer Software Engineering, HCMC University of Technology and Education,
Vietnam. 
CERTIFICATION & TRAINING 
●
Training certifications for software testing and development
